name: 3dBrickStat
author: AFNI Team
description: Compute voxel statistics of an input dataset

inputs.description: Input dataset
inputs.name: Input dataset

inputs.description: Get the information from the header only (default)
inputs.name: Quick flag

inputs.description: Read the whole dataset to find the min and max values
inputs.name: Slow flag

inputs.description: Print the minimum value in dataset
inputs.name: Minimum value flag

inputs.description: Print the maximum value in dataset (default)
inputs.name: Maximum value flag

inputs.description: Print the mean value in dataset
inputs.name: Mean value flag

inputs.description: Print the sum of values in the dataset
inputs.name: Sum value flag

inputs.description: Print the variance in the dataset
inputs.name: Variance value flag

inputs.description: Print the standard deviation in the dataset
inputs.name: Standard deviation flag

inputs.description: Print the number of voxels included
inputs.name: Count flag

inputs.description: Print the volume of voxels included in microliters
inputs.name: Volume flag

inputs.description: Include only positive voxel values
inputs.name: Positive flag

inputs.description: Include only negative voxel values
inputs.name: Negative flag

inputs.description: Include only zero voxel values
inputs.name: Zero flag

inputs.description: Include only voxel values 0 or negative
inputs.name: Non-positive flag

inputs.description: Include only voxel values 0 or greater
inputs.name: Non-negative flag

inputs.description: Include only voxel values not equal to 0
inputs.name: Non-zero flag

inputs.description: Use absolute value of voxel values for all calculations
inputs.name: Absolute value flag

inputs.description: Include only voxel values that are NaN or inf. Forces -slow mode.
inputs.name: NaN value flag

inputs.description: Exclude voxel values that are NaN or inf.
inputs.name: Exclude NaN value flag

inputs.description: Use the specified dataset as mask to include/exclude voxels
inputs.name: Mask dataset

inputs.description: Only accept values between MIN and MAX (inclusive) from the mask
inputs.name: Mask range

inputs.description: Only accept values equal to VAL from the mask
inputs.name: Mask value

inputs.description: Automatically compute mask for dataset. Cannot be combined with -mask.
inputs.name: Automask flag

inputs.description: Compute and print percentile values from p0% to p1% at a step of ps%. Only one sub-brick is accepted as input with this option.
inputs.name: Percentile values

inputs.description: Like -percentile, but output the given percentiles
inputs.name: Percentile list

inputs.description: Shortcut for -percentile 50 1 50 (or -perclist 1 50)
inputs.name: Median value flag

inputs.description: Only print percentile results, not input percentile cutoffs
inputs.name: Percentile quiet flag

inputs.description: Print author and version info
inputs.name: Version info flag

inputs.description: Print help screen
inputs.name: Help flag
